casebody.data:
LIBERTARIANS FOR TRANSPARENT GOVERNMENT, a NJ Nonprofit Corporation, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
GOVERNMENT RECORDS COUNCIL, and Frank Caruso, in his capacity as Records Custodian for the Government Records Council, Defendants-Respondents. C-931 September Term 2017
080754 Supreme Court of New Jersey. June 15, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-005563-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
